journeyRoles.name: At the helm
journeyRoles.instructions:
Navigate the ship through the wilds.
• Make Cut rolls to steer through obstacles
• Respond to hazards ahead with quick decisions
• Keep the ship on course toward your destination

journeyRoles.name: On watch
journeyRoles.instructions:
Keep an eye out for danger and opportunities.
• Make Sense rolls to spot threats and landmarks
• Alert the crew to approaching hazards
• Maintain situational awareness of surroundings

journeyRoles.name: Cartographising
journeyRoles.instructions:
Map the journey and chart the surrounding wilds.
• Make Study rolls to accurately chart your course
• Record landmarks, discoveries, and safe routes
• Improve future navigation through the same area

journeyRoles.name: Tending the engine
journeyRoles.instructions:
Maintain the ship's propulsion systems.
• Make Build rolls to keep the engine running smoothly
• Respond quickly to mechanical failures
• Optimize speed and fuel efficiency

journeyRoles.name: Watch the weather
journeyRoles.instructions:
Monitor environmental conditions and patterns.
• Make Sense rolls to predict weather changes
• Warn the crew of incoming storms or phenomena
• Help the crew adapt to changing conditions

journeyRoles.name: Tending the garden
journeyRoles.instructions:
Manage the ship's food production and provisions.
• Make Flourish rolls for successful cultivation
• Maintain crew morale through good food
• Prevent spoilage and manage shortages
